alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:22PM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River above Philadelphia. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water begins to cover some of the Burnside Lake Water Park roadways and camp areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Sunday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 13.2 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Philadelphi 13.0 14.0 Sun 7 pm CST 13.8 13.6 13.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 830 AM CST.
